about_the_game:
Learn about the creative process behind Irony Curtain: From Matryoshka with Love. Take a look behind the Irony Curtain to discover the classic point and click inspirations, easter eggs and the history reimagined by artists, who remember the Communist times all too well.

The artbook is presented in PDF format and will be downloaded to the game's installation directory: ...\Steam\SteamApps\common\Irony Curtain\Artbook\
